about_the_game:
Purchase of this lifetime Star Booster Pack will grant the player following boosts: earn 5 times more Stars and 100,000 Stars + 75 Hints.

Your lifetime Star Booster Pack contains:
  • x5 Stars Booster
  • 100,000 Stars
  • 75 Hints
